name: Biomachine Shooting Range
description:
A plataformer prototype,

Shoot the all the disks as quickly as possible!

be careful not to get hit by then, you will get shocked.

Move with arrowkeys and press X to jump

press N to shoot

press B then N to shoot downwards (with a small chance to break the game)

press V then N to shoot upwards (this one is fine I guess)
